short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The nation's leading retailer of pro-caliber cycling goods.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At Competitive Cyclist you'll benefit from personalized service and a vast product selection, whether you seek faster times on roads or trails. With stunning imagery and thorough descriptions and reviews of everything from socks to complete bikes, Competitive Cyclist offers the pro shop experience with unmatched convenience and value. 

On top of free shipping on all orders over $50, Competitive Cyclist offers:

• The industry's best returns policy, so you can buy worry-free
• Knowledgeable service representatives and an advanced bike fitting system
• A selection of the industry's most sought-after brands
• The Featured Bikes program—the easiest way to shop for and purchase a bike online
